title: Researchers aim to demystify complex ag water requirements for Produce Safety Rule

title_detail.value: Researchers aim to demystify complex ag water requirements for Produce Safety Rule

summary: In an effort to ensure the safety of fresh fruits and vegetables for consumers, researchers are helping to explain complex federal food safety rules and develop new ways to assess agricultural water use.

summary_detail.value: In an effort to ensure the safety of fresh fruits and vegetables for consumers, researchers are helping to explain complex federal food safety rules and develop new ways to assess agricultural water use.
